subject: What is OEM cd?
body:
Conservatives are not necessarily stupid, but most stupid people are conservatives.

My reading of history convinces me that most bad government results from too much government.

The mission of the United States is one of benevolent assimilation.

Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.

Biography is history seen through the prism of a person.

Be wiser than other people, if you can but do not tell them so.

There's no glory like those who save their country.

The older I grow the more I listen to people who don't talk much.

I am not the only person who uses his computer mainly for the purpose of diddling with his computer.

Education is a method whereby one acquires a higher grade of prejudices.

What of us lies in the hearts of others is our truest and deepest self.

I keep both eyes on my man. The basket hasn't moved on me yet.

Friendship without self-interest is one of the rare and beautiful things of life.
